review: I love this. We used to have to hook our TV up to our computers through an HDMI cable which was awkward and inconvenient, but now we just have to open chrome and start casting and we can see anything on our computer screen on the TV! Netflix and youtube apps work great, and I love being able to stream pandora through my TV/surround sound. There are lots of other great iPhone apps that can use Chromecast, including one that will put famous works of art on your TV so it doesn't look so ugly (great if it's hanging above your fireplace like mine).Setup was easy and only took a few minutes. Definitely worth the $30!
